name: SurvivalLand
description:
SurvivalLand is a platformer game in which you have to run and hide from the enemies around the maps.  You will have power ups and special platforms to help you for fleeing in special moments. Be careful because there are two types of enemies, one of them is the Brute, the standard one, but the other is the Informer, which runs away from you to warn other brutes where you are. 

This game was developed in Unreal Engine 4 and I made this game alone (the 3D assets were taken from then Internet).
